20110117014141.000|20110117014142.000|CC1|TO COMPUTER, BUT IT DOESN'T DO  
20110117014142.000|20110117014145.000|CC1|ANY DAMAGE UNTIL IT REACHES THE 
20110117014145.000|20110117014146.000|CC1|SPECIFIC COMPUTER NETWORK IT IS 
20110117014146.000|20110117014147.000|CC1|TARGETING.                      
20110117014147.000|20110117014149.000|CC1|IN THIS CASE, THE ONE RUNNING   
20110117014149.000|20110117014153.000|CC1|IRAN'S NUCLEAR PROCESSING PLANT.
20110117014153.000|20110117014154.000|CC1|THEN, IT POUNCES, SPEEDING AND  
20110117014154.000|20110117014157.000|CC1|SLOWING THE SPINNING CENTRIFUGES
20110117014157.000|20110117014158.000|CC1|SO THEY DESTROY THEMSELVES.
